mapper.select: SELECT DIV_COL, SVCID, MAXCLASSNM, MINCLASSNM, SVCSTATNM, SVCNM, PAYATNM, PLACENM, SVCURL, AREANM, IMGURL, TELNO, VMAX, VMIN, USETGTINFO, RCPTBGNDT, RCPTENDDT FROM cas_other WHERE SVCID=#{SVCID};

SELECT DIV_COL, SVCID, MAXCLASSNM, MINCLASSNM, SVCSTATNM, SVCNM, PAYATNM, PLACENM, SVCURL, AREANM, IMGURL, TELNO FROM cas_other WHERE SVCSTATNM LIKE '%접수중%' AND DIV_COL LIKE concat('%', #{DIV_COL}, '%') ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 15;

SELECT DIV_COL, SVCID, MAXCLASSNM, MINCLASSNM, SVCSTATNM, SVCNM, PAYATNM, PLACENM, SVCURL, AREANM, IMGURL, TELNO FROM cas_other
